title: State Machine Controller (SMC) Definition Schema
description: Defines the mandatory structural constraints for all DSE state machine configuration manifests (e.g., gsep_c_flow.json). Ensures auditable, deterministic, non-branching transition structures.

flow_id.description: Unique identifier for the state machine flow (e.g., GSEP-C)

version.description: Semantic versioning of the flow definition.

stages.description: Ordered list of atomic execution stages (S00 to S14).

actor_role.description: The specific role defined in aam_definition.in.json responsible for this stage.

input_requirement.description: List of required input artifacts/telemetry (references artifact_manifest_schema.json).

output_artifact.description: Artifact produced upon successful execution (can be 'N/A' if pure verification stage).

verification_target.description: Reference to the specific constraint in ACVD or telemetry_spec (e.g., 'ACVD/GAX_III_CSR_AUDIT').

failure_policy.description: Policy triggered upon stage constraint failure. IntegrityHalt fulfills M-01.
